updates.title: “What working in retail taught me about UX design”
updates.description: Before I ever mapped a user journey online, I was wrangling life‑size elephants on Oxford Street. As you do. My first career was in fashion retail, starting on the shop floor at River Island and eventually moving into visual merchandising in central London. updates.title: Dragon Rouge creates pre-school snack brand for Goodies
updates.description: Dragon Rouge has created a characterful brand world for Goodies, The Hero Group’s new snack range aimed at pre-schoolers. The teams used a joyfully chaotic focus group of three to six-year-olds to help shape the product and the design language. Martha Miralles, senior vice president of The Hero Group’s Growing Up products, explains that Goodies […]What to read next: BrandOpus creates new brand and packaging for Alpen | Derek&Eric heroes “the dude” logo for innocent’s brand refresh | Dog wash bra

updates.title: DeepSeek just dropped two insanely powerful AI models that rival GPT-5 and they're totally free
updates.description: Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek released two powerful new AI models on Sunday that the company claims match or exceed the capabilities of OpenAI's GPT-5 and Google's Gemini-3.0-Pro — a development that could reshape the competitive landscape between American tech giants and their Chinese challengers.The Hangzhou-based company launched DeepSeek-V3.2, designed as an everyday reasoning assistant, alongside DeepSeek-V3.2-Speciale, a high-powered variant that achieved gold-medal perf

updates.title: MIT offshoot Liquid AI releases blueprint for enterprise-grade small-model training
updates.description: When Liquid AI, a startup founded by MIT computer scientists back in 2023, introduced its Liquid Foundation Models series 2 (LFM2) in July 2025, the pitch was straightforward: deliver the fastest on-device foundation models on the market using the new "liquid" architecture, with training and inference efficiency that made small models a serious alternative to cloud-only large language models (LLMs) such as OpenAI's GPT series and Google's Gemini. The initial release shipped dense checkpoints at

updates.title: Using Claude Projects to Develop Quality Content
updates.description:
Want to create high-quality, on-brand blog posts, YouTube descriptions, or eBooks at scale? Wondering how to set up a reliable, efficient, and replicable workflow with AI?  In this article, you’ll learn how to streamline and scale content production with Claude Projects. Why Few-Shot Prompting and Claude Projects Work Better Than AI Chats for Content Creation […]
The post Using Claude Projects to Develop Quality Content appeared first on Social Media Examiner.

updates.title: How is FutureBrand using AI?
updates.description: FutureBrand is a global strategy and design agency that works with clients like Mastercard, Merck and San Pellegrino. Here executive creative director Stephen McGilvray explains how they’re using AI, and how he feels about it. You can see all the articles in this series here. updates.title: Mistral launches Mistral 3, a family of open models designed to run on laptops, drones, and edge devices
updates.description: Mistral AI, Europe's most prominent artificial intelligence startup, is releasing its most ambitious product suite to date: a family of 10 open-source models designed to run everywhere from smartphones and autonomous drones to enterprise cloud systems, marking a major escalation in the company's challenge to both U.S. tech giants and surging Chinese competitors.The Mistral 3 family, launching today, includes a new flagship model called Mistral Large 3 and a suite of smaller "Ministral 3" models

updates.title: Level up your design skills for 2026
updates.description: Get $200 off courses for experienced UX and product designers—AI for UX, Advanced Figma, AI Prototyping & more. Sale ends Dec 2.
